fields.name: Mark for Demise (Cost 50%/40%):
fields.value: Target a player. They will be Marked for Demise, permanently decreasing their Defense Power by 0.1x

fields.name: Power of Many (Passive):
fields.value: If you are alive, all Mages aligned with you, including yourself, gain the Mark for Demise ability with (Cost 70%/50%).

fields.name: Exterminate (x1, Cost 150%/150%, Locked):
fields.value: This ability is unlocked when you place Top 3 in a round. You astrally attack all players who are Marked for Demise.

fields.name: Annihilation (x1, Cost ?%x8/?%x7):
fields.value: Use during the Evening, before results. You may spend as much score as you wish from the Mage Energy Pool. For every 8%/7% spent, you will increase the threshold for this ability by 1%. All players who place below the threshold this Evening will instantly be hit by a 10.0x Attack Power attack. This ability cannot be copied, stolen, or otherwise used by any role that is not Ritualist.
